duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist manager with department scheduling, directing workflow, daily associate assignments, and monitoring project status.
Help communicate information to department associates regarding Company initiatives, programs, promotions, etc.
Ensure that Company merchandising and presentation standards are met by following established floor sets, signing requirements, price changes, replenishment and recovery processes, in-stock, etc.
Engage in behaviors that are in line with the Company's customer service and selling program, thus providing all customers with an outstanding store experience.
Maintaining Company loss prevention standards and controls in the Department.
Assist with training associates on Company procedures and programs; this includes new associate training and cross training current associates.
Perform other tasks as assigned by management.
